General.Name: Ningbo Tip Rubber Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo TIP Rubber Technology Co.,Ltd focuses on the research and development, production, and sale of automotive polymers fluid piping systems, and sealing system parts and assemblies. It offers engine accessory system hoses and assemblies; air conditioning systems; power steering systems; body accessory system hoses and assemblies; fuel system hoses and assemblies; and rubber molded products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Ninghai, China.
